item.title: Quick tutorial on blog web with hugo and netlify
item.description: How to Create a Blog with Hugo and Deploy on Netlify # Creating a blog with Hugo and deploying it on Netlify is a streamlined and efficient process. Hugo is a powerful static site generator that allows for quick and easy website development. Netlify provides seamless deployment and hosting for static sites. Here’s a step-by-step guide to get your blog up and running. Prerequisites # Install Hugo by following the installation guide.
